Your involvement in our study is greatly appreciated.

As a thank you for sharing your time and data with us, and supporting our research study, you can enter our prize draw.

This will give you a chance to win one of ten £25 Amazon gift cards as a thank you for taking part.
Will you be interested in participating in the raffle draw for a £25 Amazon gift card? This to thank you for participating in the study.
Are you interested in answering three short questions in order to provide feedback regarding your participation in this research?
